name: Hide 'N' Seek
description:
This is our game Hide 'N' Seek, it is a 2D side scroller multiplayer game for 2 - 4 players. This has been our project for the last 2 and a half months. Will still be rolling out updates in the near future. There are a few bugs that we are aware of and will be fixed in future updates.

The game will only begin when there are at least TWO PLAYERS connected on the same server, AT LEAST ONE HIDER and ONE SEEKER. The game will begin with a 30 second count down to give the hider enough time to run and hide. After that the seeker is free, so make sure you hide well!

Seeker Controls:

Arrow Keys - Character Movement

E - Interact with Doors/Stairs

F - Search for Hider (Use on objects within the level)

Hider Controls:

Arrow Keys - Character Movement

E - Interact with Doors/Stairs, to hide and to un hide.
